as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

value.description: The value given as data when submitted with a name.
value.description_zh: 使用名称提交时作为数据给出的值。

disabled.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the radio item.
disabled.description_zh: 如果为 true，则阻止用户与单选项目交互。

required.description: When true, indicates that the user must check the radio item before the owning form can be submitted.
required.description_zh: 如果为 true，则指示用户必须先检查单选项目，然后才能提交所属表单。
